title: [Silver Avenue, Dead End]
description: The street dead-ends at the town wall.  The homes here are new ones, freshly painted in various colors.  Many are still being constructed.  In front of one cottage, an elven man and child kneel about a small modwir tree.

The street dead-ends at the town wall.  The homes here are new ones, freshly painted in various bright colors.  Many are still being constructed.  In front of one green and yellow cottage, an elven man and child kneel about a small modwir tree.
